description.value: Underlying Code System for V2 table 0123 (Result Status)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

display.value: Order received; specimen not yet received

definition.value: Order received; specimen not yet received

display.value: No results available; specimen received, procedure incomplete

definition.value: No results available; specimen received, procedure incomplete

display.value: No results available; procedure scheduled, but not done

definition.value: No results available; procedure scheduled, but not done

display.value: Some, but not all, results available

definition.value: Some, but not all, results available

display.value: Preliminary: A verified early result is available, final results not yet obtained

definition.value: Preliminary: A verified early result is available, final results not yet obtained

display.value: Final results; results stored and verified. Can only be changed with a corrected result.

definition.value: Final results; results stored and verified. Can only be changed with a corrected result.

display.value: No order on record for this test. (Used only on queries)

definition.value: No order on record for this test. (Used only on queries)

display.value: No record of this patient. (Used only on queries)

definition.value: No record of this patient. (Used only on queries)
